channel.title: Communication on SwissRN
channel.description: Recent content in Communication on SwissRN

item.title: Communication
item.description:
One of the SwissRN Focus Areas is communication:

  • Dissemination of new evidence
  • Propagation of best practices
  • Promotion of a culture change

Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
